caption.p: Ultrastructural features of the osmophores in Mangifera indica in pre-anthesis. (A) General view of the epidermal cells. (B) Cuticle. Asterisks indicate the secretions stored between the plasma membrane and the cell wall. (C) Epidermal cell with polyribosomes, mitochondria, plastids containing starch, vacuoles and oil droplets. (D) Plasmodesma between epidermal cells. Ct, cuticle; Cw, cell wall; Mi, mitochondria; Ni, nucleolus; Nu, nucleus; Oi, oil droplet; Pd, plasmodesma; Pl, plastid; Re, rough endoplasmic reticulum; Va, vacuole.
